item.title: Why you should join the Frictionless Data Hackathon
item.description: A sneak preview of the submitted projects to give you all a few good reasons to register for the Frictionless Data Hackathon

item.title: Frictionless Data 26 August 2021 Virtual Hangout
item.description: At our Frictionless Data community call we had Amber York and Adam Shepherd from BCO-DMO giving a presentation on Frictionless Data Pipelines for Ocean Science...

item.title: Frictionless Data 12 August 2021 Virtual Hangout
item.description: At our Frictionless Data community call we had Dave Rowe giving a presentation on Frictionless Data for public libraries...

item.title: Frictionless Data and Dryad join forces to validate research data
item.description: A great way to share research data is to upload it to a repository, but how do we ensure that uploaded data doesn't have issues? Frictionless Data and Dryad join forces to revamp the upload page for the Dryad application, now including the Frictionless validation functionality to check for data quality.

item.title: The first six community calls of 2021 - a recap.
item.description: Looking back at all that has happened in the Frictionless Community over these past 6 months.

item.title: Apply Now - become a Frictionless Data Reproducible Research Fellow
item.description: Apply today to join the Third Cohort of Frictionless Data Fellows!

item.title: Frictionless Repository
item.description: Introducing you to Repository, the new Frictionless Data tool that allows you to automate the validation workflows of your datasets.
